titleStmt.title: An off-spring of mercy, issuing out of the womb of cruelty. or, A passion sermon preached at Christs-Church in Oxford, by that late renowned ornament of the University, William Carwright.
titleStmt.author: Cartwright, William, 1611-1643.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A.M. and are to be sold by Iohn Brown at the guilded Acorn in Pauls-Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A passion sermon.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
